## Summary

Our work on DASH funded by the ESRC and that concluded that the risk assessment tool used by British police is not effective at predicting domestic abuse is cited in these pieces that tell the story of how finally the British government is coming to the same conclusion. [Here](https://www.theguardian.com/society/2025/aug/26/domestic-violence-screening-tool-should-be-replaced-jess-phillips-says) to the Guardian piece and [here](https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/cr4e7yrxkgvo) the BBC article.
